RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YO YO MON swept to the lead on the turn, drew off, driving. MIRACLE DRUG (IRE) rallied, second best. OUR FLIRTATION mild bid, flattened out. MARIPOSA D'ORO set pace, tired. DAIGLE up close, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Yo Mon
ENTRY.COMMENT: swept to lead on the turn, drew off,driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENZOEXPRESS rushed to lead, raced four wide, held driving. JULIE'S FERRARI settled early, swung five wide for the drive, rallied strongly. FUNKY MUSIC chased pace, needed more. QUAD EIGHTS up close, weakened. MASKED outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, swung five wide, rallied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In E ligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BALI BALIFLY set pace, drew off around the turn, ridden out. FLECHE D'AMOUR chased winner, second best. CHINATOWN NANCY reserved early, mild rally. IRON WILMA up close early, tired. ESTA CALIENTE no factor. GOTTA HAVE FAITH outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Bali Balifly
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off on turn, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLACK BULL commenced bid midrace, raced six wide, driving. JOHN'S KID dueled, held place. COMMANDING stumbled break, stalked leaders, needed more late. TRUST FUND ROBBER lacked rally. CAPTAIN BERNARDO contested pace, tired. GONNA WIN IT outrun. UNKEMPT outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Black Bull
ENTRY.COMMENT: commenced bid midrace, raced six wide, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Commanding
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled break, stalked leaders, needed more late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ILLUSIONS OF LOVE dueled, drew clear on turn, driving. GOLD PASS steadied in turn, rallied for place. BISCOTTINI hung late. MAVI needed more. YESTERDAYSPLAN raced wide, no threat. SHORE OF EDEN dueled early, stopped. PER RULING 195 FROM MOUNTANIER STEWARDS, BISCOTTINI WAS DQD FOR A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied in turn, rallied for place

ENTRY.NAME: Illusions of Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, drew clear on turn, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STORIED FELLA well back early, rallied strongly inside, driving. JOCKO ROAD rallied. CAJUN MANDATE set pace, opened lead, gave way late. DEJOHN mild bid. AS DE ORO COCO no menace. BECKHAM JAMES outrun. MI GUSTO ES tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Mandate
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, opened lead, gave way late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 10100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HURRICANE rallied, driving. TURBINADO moved four wide, rallied for place. EL CARDINAL set pace, opened lead, gave way late. SOUTHERN SENSE no menace. THREE MILE LIMIT dueled,stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: El Cardinal
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, opened lead, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Turbinado
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved four wide, rallied for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMALL BUT FEISTY stalked pace, assumed command, driving. PRETTY LOUD rallied strongly for the place. REGAL HOLIDAY in good position, caught late for second. DUBROVNIK lacked bid. GALLIPOLIS mild bid, drifted in. EL DUQUE outrun. BARELYSTILLCOUNTS steadied turn. RESVALON tired. SOLAR TAP set pace, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Regal Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: in good position, caught late for second
